attributes.action: Stop giving away British taxpayers money to foreign countries on unproven "green" issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am resubmitting this petition with no alterations because it is not defamatory, false or libellous

Currently the prime minister is giving away our money to the eussr, on the premise that it will be used to cut carbon emissions in foreign countries.  There is no realistic scientific evidence that there is global warming, or that man could have such an effect, and as we are currently in a recession we should not be wasting any money on this lie.

rejection.details: Your premise that there is no evidence of global warming is simply false.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
